verses.roman:
kīrtana dekhiyā rājāra haila camatkāra
prabhuke milite utkaṇṭhā bāḍila apāra

synonyms: kīrtana dekhiyā—seeing the performance of kīrtana; rājāra—of the King; haila—there was; camatkāra—astonishment; prabhuke—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; milite—to meet; utkaṇṭhā—anxiety; bāḍila—increased; apāra—unlimitedly.
translation: The King was very much astonished to see Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu's kīrtana, and the King's anxiety to meet Him increased unlimitedly.
